div.span: WELCOME TO GADSDEN COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT

span.strong: Notice of Reasonable Accommodations for Employment Applicants

p.span: Reasonable accommodations are available for persons with disabilities to complete the application and/or interview process. Applicants/individuals with disabilities requesting accommodations under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) may contact the Gadsden County Human Resource Department at 35 Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd or call 850-627-9651 x 1228 for assistance.
